name: Ladyburn 1974
description: Ladyburn 1974 by Green House Seeds is an indica-dominant hybrid cross between Jack Herer and Ice Dream. Balanced effects offer both physical and mental relief, as well as effective pain management. Beginner growers will find success in both indoor or outdoor grows, with flowers at around 9 weeks.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Creative, Giggly, Hungry, Fatigue, Cramps, Eye Pressure, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Dry Mouth
